attributes.action: Sack all current sitting MP's and prevent them from being re-elected
attributes.background: Due to the general lack of ability and common sense thinking needed to run a country, sitting members of Parliament are to be removed from their positions and replaced with correctly qualified and experienced people - just like in the real world.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their view or opinions. 

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
